headline: Keybanc Maintains Overweight on Ventas, Raises Price Target to $90
summary: Keybanc  analyst Todd M. Thomas   maintains Ventas (NYSE:VTR) with a Overweight and raises the price target from $85 to $90.

raw.headline: Keybanc Maintains Overweight on Ventas, Raises Price Target to $90

headline: Ventas, Inc. (VTR) Reports Strong 2025 Growth, Accelerates Senior Housing Investments
summary: Ventas, Inc. (NYSE:VTR) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top REIT stock picks. On February 5, Ventas, Inc. (NYSE:VTR) reported its full-year and fourth-quarter 2025 results, highlighting strong growth across its senior housing portfolio. CEO Debra Cafaro noted that Same-Store Cash NOI in the Senior Housing Operating Portfolio (SHOP) rose by more than 15% for the […]

headline: 36 U.S. REITs Expected To Raise Dividends In Q1 2026
summary: 36 publicly traded US REITs are projected to increase dividend payouts in the first quarter, according to S&P Global Market Intelligence forecasts.
